ygData.subject: Re: Unpopular view...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... anymore? ... hour and half.  And half of that time i spent screwing around dot kiting and then headed to karnors into captain group with a full group (all
ygData.messageBody:
> I can relate to this too. Could it be that Hell levels dont exist
anymore?
> Im in 45. This morning I got 2 blue bubbles in 45 in less then an
hour and half. And half of that time i spent screwing around dot
kiting and then headed to karnors into captain group with a full
group (all of which had many levels higher then me).
>
> Minkin

I didn't play last night, so I can't add my own experiences, but the
way they're splitting experience now, the lowest level in the group
will level faster than the highest level in the group (especially if
there's a large level difference).

Also, for every hybrid you add to your group (you're one, so that's a
huge bonus), you are now NOT sharing their 40% penalty. A group of 6
Hybrids would FLY compared to how they leveled pre-patch (it's all
relative, tho.. a group of 6 Hybrids will level at the same pace as a
group of 6 Clerics, for example). And that's before the Group EXP
Bonus. You will now NOT share the 10% penalty for INT Casters, 20%
for Monks, 20%? for Ogres, Trolls and Shaman.

A Hybrid soloing will level 40% faster than he did pre-patch. A
Druid soloing will level at the exact same pace.

Hell levels still do exist (they didn't change the exp tables at
all), but you're moving so fast now they don't seem so bad.
Hopefully, 59 will seem like 51 used to. :)

Darkfox
Xegony
